author: slezki
body:
This is essentially two requests for two backports of PRs:
Firstly, need to backport the PR: #24613
Secondly, need to backport the PR: #24902

the second PR (#24902) is to test new readouts by using new RPC digi merger in PR: #24613.
title: Backport of the PR #24613 and #24902: RPC digi merger and test new readouts
